author: Mercer
description: A 2.5 release guide for Ye Shunguang

weapons.name: Cloudcleave Radiance
weapons.description: Perfect synergy with Ye Shunguang as it provides a huge CDMG% boost on top of DMG% and Phys Res ignore.
weapons.title: Best W-Engine

weapons.name: The Brimstone
weapons.description: At low copy levels a somewhat mediocre option but scales excellently at higher levels due to most of Ye Shunguang's attacks during Enlightened Mind State being from basic attacks although you have to use more in-air basic attacks to ramp stacks faster. At max copies this W-Engine performs close to her Signature. Make sure to run CMDG% in Slot 4 of Disk Drives.
weapons.title: Good Scaling

weapons.name: Severed Innocence
weapons.description: A good stat sick due to purely being CDMG% and no CRATE%.
weapons.title: Best Limited Non-Signature W-Engine

weapons.name: Steel Cushion
weapons.description: A good alternative incase you do not own The Brimstone due to high base stats and Phys DMG%. Make sure to run CMDG% in Slot 4 of Disk Drives.
weapons.title: Alternative to The Brimstone

four_pieces.name: White Water Ballad
four_pieces.description: Custom made specifically for Ye Shunguang, provides an insane amount of CRATE% while in any <ether> Ether Veil which Ye Shunguang provides herself.

two_pieces.name: Branch & Blade Song
two_pieces.description: Better against bosses with low <def> DEF like Ye Shunguang's own boss in Deadly Assault. Main recommendation.

two_pieces.name: Puffer Electro / Astral Voice
two_pieces.description: Better against Deadly Assault bosses with higher <def> DEF and Shiyu Defense enemies. Choose which ever has better sub-stats.

extra_sections.title: Crit Rate Note
extra_sections.description: Ye Shunguang only needs 50% CRATE% in the stat screen to get 100% in combat due to her 4 Piece set giving 20% and her Core Passive at max rank giving 30%. Don't overcap

stat.sub_stats: CRATE% Until 50% in stat screen > CDMG% > <atk> ATK%

extra_sections.title: Crit Rate Note
extra_sections.description: Ye Shunguang only needs 50% CRATE% in the stat screen to get 100% in combat due to her 4 Piece set giving 20% and her Core Passive at max rank giving 30%. Don't overcap

skill_priority.description: Most of Ye Shunguan's damage comes from basic attack and ultimate.

mindscapes.description: Grants full stacks of her passive at the start of combat while also giving some nice damage boosts in the form of raw DMG% and <def> DEF IGNORE%
Allows more overcapping of her passive stacks while giving some of her attacks additional <def> DEF IGNORE% while also allowing for new rotations due to more Culmination stacks.
Grants 1000 Decibels at the start of combat while increasing the max % of <ether> Ether Veil: Verdict.
